input.title: Input
input.subtitle: Input field component with support for validation, formatting, icons and various states

basic.title: Basic Example
basic.description: Standard input field with basic functionality

filled.title: Filled Style
filled.description: Input field with filled background. Set by `variant="filled"` property

size.title: Size
size.description: Input field size is controlled by the `size` property. Available values: `sm` (small), `lg` (large). Medium size is used by default

invalid.title: Error State
invalid.description: Input field in error state with red border. Activated by `invalid` property

disabled.title: Disabled State
disabled.description: Inactive input field, unavailable for interaction. Set by `disabled` property

clearable.title: Clearable Input
clearable.description: Input field with automatic clear button. Activated by `clearable` property. Button appears on focus or hover if field is not empty

customClearIcon.title: Custom Clear Icon
customClearIcon.description: Input field with custom clear icon. Configured via `clearIcon` property (default CloseIcon)

formatter.title: Input Formatting
formatter.description: Input field with automatic formatting. Configured via `formatter` (formatting function) and `parser` (parsing function) properties

password.title: Password Field
password.description: Input field for password with visibility toggle. Activated by `showPassword` property. Automatically switches type between 'password' and 'text'

limitLength.title: Length Limit
limitLength.description: Input field with character counter display. Activated by `showWordLimit` property and requires `maxlength` to be set. Shows current character count and limit

withIcon.title: Field with Icon
withIcon.description: Input field with icon. Icon is set to the left and right of input field via `prefix` and `suffix` slots or via `prefixIcon` and `suffixIcon` properties (Component)

inputGroup.title: Input Group
inputGroup.description: Composition of multiple elements combined into a logical group. Uses `prepend` (left) and `append` (right) slots to add buttons or other elements

argTypes.variant: Visual display variant of input. Defines the style (filled, outlined)
argTypes.size: Input size. Controls element scale through predefined size variants
argTypes.invalid: Error state. Enables visual error indication and blocks interaction
argTypes.disabled: Disabled state. Enables visual indication of disabled state and blocks interaction
argTypes.clearable: Clear value capability. Enables clear button and allows deleting entered data
argTypes.showPassword: Show password. Enables displaying password as text and hides it as dots
argTypes.showWordLimit: Show character limit. Enables displaying character limit and count of entered characters
argTypes.formatter: Value formatting function. Transforms entered value according to predefined format
argTypes.modelValue: Input value. Can be used to initialize value or display current value
argTypes.parser: Value parsing function. Transforms formatted value back to original
argTypes.clearIcon: Clear icon. Graphic element used to clear input value
argTypes.prefixIcon: Prefix icon. Graphic element used to display prefix of input value
argTypes.suffixIcon: Suffix icon. Graphic element used to display suffix of input value
argTypes.prepend: Slot for content before input field
argTypes.append: Slot for content after input field
argTypes.change: Event fired when input value changes
argTypes.clear: Event fired when input is cleared
argTypes.mouseenter: Event fired when mouse enters input area
argTypes.mouseleave: Event fired when mouse leaves input area
